name: Mint (itch) (meichnpp)
description:
- Control
Arrow keys: Move
Space,A-Button : Start

- How to play
Your objective is to eat some of the dots on the stage.
When ESA reaches 0, the stage is finished.
When you touch an enemy, your PW will decrease.
If you eat an apple, the enemy will turn gray for a while.
You can score points by eating gray enemies.
When PW reaches 0, the game is over.

- Download
https://ni.10-59.com/zip/mint.zip
The ZIP file contains a ROM file and a BAS file.
When playing on a real MSX machine, save mint.bas and mint.bin to a floppy disk, etc. and run "mint.bas" in MSX-BASIC.
When playing on an MSX emulator, specify mint.rom in the ROM file and start it up.
